title: Stage Lv10-S36
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Is there something I might have missed?
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Is there something I might have missed?
Is it okay to interpret it this way?

sentences.kr: 내 생각이 맞다면, 이렇게 되는 건가?
sentences.en: If I'm right, does this mean it works like this?

sentences.kr: 확인 차 묻는 건데, 정말 그런 거야?
sentences.en: Just to confirm, is that really the case?

sentences.kr: 혹시 내가 잘못 알고 있는 건 아니겠지?
sentences.en: I'm not mistaken about this, am I?

sentences.kr: 다시 한 번 확인해보자면, 이게 맞지?
sentences.en: To double-check, this is correct, right?
From what I understand... is that right?
